3.0 RC 2 Test Pass

It happend while testing the opening of perspectives. When executing Window >
Open Perspective > Other... > Java Browsing nothing happened and the log below
was created. Doing this a second time correctly opened the perspective.

Sorry no detailed steps.

I can't recreate this.

Dani, what perspective layout do you use? The default? the R2.1 presentation ? 
other settings related to the perspective switcher, do you dock it on top or 
left?

I used a fresh workspace no settings changed (except modifying the resource
perspective and saved As... Resource perspective).
I was also using Opening External File... (ZIP)
*** Bug 66897 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

The logic for relocating the LRU item has been moved to PerspectiveBarManager 
and no longer uses the perspective descriptor which caused the NPE. The code 
has not been committed yet. It still requires a review and a small fix.

no longer necessary, this method has completely changed.
marking as fixed.
